üéØ Tentang FacebookPro Blaster

FacebookPro Blaster adalah platform automasi Facebook enterprise-grade yang dirancang khusus untuk mengelola multiple akun Facebook secara efisien, aman, dan otomatis. Dengan teknologi AI terbaru dan system concurrency management yang canggih, platform ini adalah solusi terbaik untuk agency, marketer, dan business owner.

‚ú® Keunggulan Utama

üîÑ Multi-Account

Kelola hingga 50 akun dalam satu dashboard

ü§ñ AI-Powered

Generasi konten dengan 40+ AI models

‚ö° Smart Concurrency

System antrian dan distribusi yang optimal

üì± Telegram Bot

Kontrol penuh via Telegram

üîí Enterprise Security

Multi-layer security & encryption

‚è∞ 24/7 Automation

Berjalan otomatis tanpa pengawasan

üéØ About FacebookPro Blaster

FacebookPro Blaster is an enterprise-grade Facebook automation platform specifically designed to manage multiple Facebook accounts efficiently, securely, and automatically. With the latest AI technology and sophisticated concurrency management system, this platform is the best solution for agencies, marketers, and business owners.

‚ú® Key Features

üîÑ Multi-Account

Manage up to 50 accounts in one dashboard

ü§ñ AI-Powered

Content generation with 40+ AI models

‚ö° Smart Concurrency

Optimal queue and distribution system

üì± Telegram Bot

Full control via Telegram

üîí Enterprise Security

Multi-layer security & encryption

‚è∞ 24/7 Automation

Runs automatically without supervision

1. Prasyarat

  • Node.js: Versi 18.x atau lebih baru (Download)
  • Sistem Operasi: Windows 10+, Ubuntu 20.04+, Debian 11+, Fedora 36+, atau Arch Linux
  • Kunci Lisensi: Format FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX
  • Akun Facebook: Akun aktif untuk otomasi

1. Prerequisites

  • Node.js: Version 18.x or newer (Download)
  • Operating System: Windows 10+, Ubuntu 20.04+, Debian 11+, Fedora 36+, or Arch Linux
  • License Key: Format FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX
  • Facebook Account: Active account for automation

2. Instalasi & Setup

ü™ü Windows

Langkah 1: Ekstrak File

Ekstrak file ZIP ke C:\FacebookProBlaster\

Langkah 2: Jalankan Setup

Klik kanan setup-windows.bat ‚Üí Run as administrator

‚úÖ Paling Mudah! Script ini langsung berfungsi tanpa konfigurasi apapun.
‚ö†Ô∏è Alternatif PowerShell: Jika menggunakan setup-windows.ps1 dan diblokir, jalankan: 
Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser

üêß Linux

unzip FacebookPro_Blaster_*.zip -d ~/FacebookProBlaster
cd ~/FacebookProBlaster
chmod +x setup-linux.sh
./setup-linux.sh

üêß Linux / VPS (Server-Side Secure)

Setup di VPS (Ubuntu/Debian) - Versi Secure

Versi ini menggunakan arsitektur keamanan tinggi dengan logic terkompilasi (.jsc).

# Update & Install Requirements
sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y nodejs npm python3.12 python3-pip

# Extract package
unzip FacebookPro_Blaster_Ultimate_Secure_*.zip -d ~/fbpro
cd ~/fbpro

# Install Dependencies
npm install
py -3.12 -m pip install insightface onnxruntime opencv-python

# Activate license
node start activate YOUR_LICENSE_KEY

# Start system with PM2
npm install -g pm2
pm2 start start --name "fbpro-blaster"
pm2 save
üìã Kebutuhan Server-Side:
  • Node.js 20+: Menggunakan fitur-fitur runtime terbaru.
  • Python 3.12: Wajib untuk pemrosesan Face Swap lokal.
  • Internet: Memerlukan koneksi stabil untuk verifikasi logic handshake.

Setup Manual (Jika Script Tidak Bekerja)

npm install
mkdir accounts videos photos logs backups downloads temp data

2. Installation & Setup

ü™ü Windows

Step 1: Extract Files

Extract ZIP file to C:\FacebookProBlaster\

Step 2: Run Setup

Right-click setup-windows.bat ‚Üí Run as administrator

‚úÖ Easiest Method! This script works immediately without any configuration.
‚ö†Ô∏è PowerShell Alternative: If using setup-windows.ps1 and it's blocked, run: 
Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser

üêß Linux

unzip FacebookPro_Blaster_*.zip -d ~/FacebookProBlaster
cd ~/FacebookProBlaster
chmod +x setup-linux.sh
./setup-linux.sh

üêß Linux / VPS (Server-Side Secure)

Setup on VPS (Ubuntu/Debian) - Secure Edition

This version uses high-security architecture with compiled logic (.jsc).

# Update & Install Requirements
sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y nodejs npm python3.12 python3-pip

# Extract package
unzip FacebookPro_Blaster_Ultimate_Secure_*.zip -d ~/fbpro
cd ~/fbpro

# Install Dependencies
npm install
py -3.12 -m pip install insightface onnxruntime opencv-python

# Activate license
node start activate YOUR_LICENSE_KEY

# Start system with PM2
npm install -g pm2
pm2 start start --name "fbpro-blaster"
pm2 save
üìã Server-Side Requirements:
  • Node.js 20+: For latest runtime features and performance.
  • Python 3.12: Required for local Face Swap processing.
  • Internet: Requires stable connection for secure handshake verification.

Manual Setup (If Scripts Don't Work)

npm install
mkdir accounts videos photos logs backups downloads temp data

3. Aktivasi Lisensi

Aktivasi Lisensi Anda

node bot/sys-init FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Contoh:

node bot/sys-init FBPRO-STRT-3847-9201-0001

Paket Lisensi

Paket Perangkat Akun FB Durasi Cocok Untuk
TRIAL üéÅ 1 1 3 Hari Testing & Demo
STARTER 2 5 1 Tahun Pemula & Individual
PRO ‚≠ê 5 15 2 Tahun Profesional & Bisnis
AGENCY üöÄ 15 50 2 Tahun Agency & Enterprise
üí° Catatan:
  • TRIAL: Gratis, 3 hari, 1x per device (HWID)
  • STARTER: Entry level, cocok untuk pemula
  • PRO: Paling populer! Best value untuk profesional
  • AGENCY: Unlimited power untuk operasi skala besar

3. License Activation

Activate Your License

node bot/sys-init FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Example:

node bot/sys-init FBPRO-STRT-3847-9201-0001

License Packages

Package Devices FB Accounts Duration Best For
TRIAL üéÅ 1 1 3 Days Testing & Demo
STARTER 2 5 1 Year Beginners & Individual
PRO ‚≠ê 5 15 2 Years Professional & Business
AGENCY üöÄ 15 50 2 Years Agency & Enterprise
üí° Notes:
  • TRIAL: Free, 3 days, 1x per device (HWID)
  • STARTER: Entry level, perfect for beginners
  • PRO: Most popular! Best value for professionals
  • AGENCY: Unlimited power for large-scale operations

4. Konfigurasi Akun

Setup Interaktif

node bot/account-setup

Anda akan ditanya:

  • ID Akun (misal, account1)
  • Nama tampilan
  • Tipe persona (friendly, professional, humorous, dll.)
  • Kredensial auto-login (direkomendasikan)
  • Fitur AI (OpenRouter, Memory System)
  • Konfigurasi Telegram

4. Account Configuration

Interactive Setup

node bot/account-setup

You'll be asked for:

  • Account ID (e.g., account1)
  • Display name
  • Persona type (friendly, professional, humorous, etc.)
  • Auto-login credentials (recommended)
  • AI features (OpenRouter, Memory System)
  • Telegram configuration

5. Kunci API

üîë OpenRouter (Prioritas)

  1. Kunjungi openrouter.ai/keys
  2. Buat akun & generate API key
  3. Tambahkan ke accounts/AKUN_ANDA/openrouter_keys.txt

ü§ñ Google Gemini (Cadangan)

  1. Kunjungi Google AI Studio
  2. Klik "Create API key"
  3. Tambahkan ke accounts/AKUN_ANDA/gemini_keys.txt
‚úÖ GRATIS! Gemini Flash tersedia gratis dengan quota yang generous.

üì± Telegram Bot

Langkah 1: Buat Bot

  1. Kirim pesan ke @BotFather di Telegram
  2. Kirim /newbot dan ikuti instruksi
  3. Salin Bot Token yang Anda terima

Langkah 2: Dapatkan Chat ID

  1. Kirim pesan ke @userinfobot di Telegram
  2. Salin Chat ID Anda

Langkah 3: Konfigurasi telegram.json

Edit telegram.json di folder root:

{
  "botToken": "BOT_TOKEN_ANDA_DISINI",
  "allowedUserIds": [CHAT_ID_ANDA],
  "chatId": CHAT_ID_ANDA
}

5. API Keys

üîë OpenRouter (Priority)

  1. Visit openrouter.ai/keys
  2. Create account & generate API key
  3. Add to accounts/YOUR_ACCOUNT/openrouter_keys.txt

ü§ñ Google Gemini (Fallback)

  1. Visit Google AI Studio
  2. Click "Create API key"
  3. Add to accounts/YOUR_ACCOUNT/gemini_keys.txt
‚úÖ FREE! Gemini Flash is available for free with generous quota.

üì± Telegram Bot

Step 1: Create Bot

  1. Message @BotFather on Telegram
  2. Send /newbot and follow instructions
  3. Copy the Bot Token you receive

Step 2: Get Chat ID

  1. Message @userinfobot on Telegram
  2. Copy your Chat ID

Step 3: Configure telegram.json

Edit telegram.json in root folder:

{
  "botToken": "YOUR_BOT_TOKEN_HERE",
  "allowedUserIds": [YOUR_CHAT_ID],
  "chatId": YOUR_CHAT_ID
}

7. Menjalankan Bot

Jalankan Manual

node bot/executor run NAMA_BOT ID_AKUN

Contoh:

node bot/executor run autolike account1
node bot/executor run uploadreels account1
node bot/executor run updatestatus account1

‚ö° NPM Shortcuts (Cara Tercepat!)

‚ú® Rekomendasi! Gunakan NPM shortcuts untuk kemudahan maksimal.

üîë Aktivasi Lisensi

npm run activate

ü§ñ Menjalankan Bot (Headless Mode - Default)

Browser tersembunyi, cocok untuk production:

npm run autolike account1
npm run videocomment account1
npm run timelinecomment account1
npm run groupcomment account1
npm run updatestatus account1
npm run uploadreels account1
npm run sharereels account1
npm run confirm account1
npm run scrape account1
npm run reply account1
npm run viewstory account1

üëÅÔ∏è Menjalankan Bot (Show Browser - Debugging)

Browser terlihat, cocok untuk debugging dan monitoring:

npm run autolike:show account1
npm run videocomment:show account1
npm run timelinecomment:show account1
npm run groupcomment:show account1
npm run updatestatus:show account1
npm run uploadreels:show account1
npm run sharereels:show account1
npm run confirm:show account1
npm run scrape:show account1
npm run reply:show account1
npm run viewstory:show account1

üç™ Cookie Generator

Generate dan kelola Facebook cookies:

# Cek validitas cookies semua akun
npm run cookies:check

# Generate cookies (headless mode)
npm run cookies:generate account1

# Generate cookies (show browser)
npm run cookies:generate:show account1

# Smart mode: cek dulu, generate jika perlu (headless)
npm run cookies:ensure account1

# Smart mode: cek dulu, generate jika perlu (show browser)
npm run cookies:ensure:show account1

üõ†Ô∏è Utility Commands

# Setup account baru
npm run setup:account

# Cek status system
npm run test:status

# List semua akun
npm run test:list

# Validate cookies
npm run test:cookies

# Refresh cookies
npm run refresh:cookies

# Start scheduler (PM2)
npm start

# Stop scheduler
npm stop

# Restart scheduler
npm restart

# View logs
npm run logs

Jalankan Terjadwal (PM2)

pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
pm2 logs
pm2 monit

Kontrol via Telegram

Setelah setup Telegram Bot, gunakan perintah:

  • /start - Mulai bot
  • /status - Lihat status
  • /run - Jalankan bot
  • /stop - Hentikan bot

7. Running Bots

Manual Run

node bot/executor run BOT_NAME ACCOUNT_ID

Examples:

node bot/executor run autolike account1
node bot/executor run uploadreels account1
node bot/executor run updatestatus account1

‚ö° NPM Shortcuts (Fastest Way!)

‚ú® Recommended! Use NPM shortcuts for maximum convenience.

üîë License Activation

npm run activate

ü§ñ Running Bots (Headless Mode - Default)

Browser hidden, suitable for production:

npm run autolike account1
npm run videocomment account1
npm run timelinecomment account1
npm run groupcomment account1
npm run updatestatus account1
npm run uploadreels account1
npm run sharereels account1
npm run confirm account1
npm run scrape account1
npm run reply account1
npm run viewstory account1

üëÅÔ∏è Running Bots (Show Browser - Debugging)

Browser visible, suitable for debugging and monitoring:

npm run autolike:show account1
npm run videocomment:show account1
npm run timelinecomment:show account1
npm run groupcomment:show account1
npm run updatestatus:show account1
npm run uploadreels:show account1
npm run sharereels:show account1
npm run confirm:show account1
npm run scrape:show account1
npm run reply:show account1
npm run viewstory:show account1

üç™ Cookie Generator

Generate and manage Facebook cookies:

# Check cookie validity for all accounts
npm run cookies:check

# Generate cookies (headless mode)
npm run cookies:generate account1

# Generate cookies (show browser)
npm run cookies:generate:show account1

# Smart mode: check first, generate if needed (headless)
npm run cookies:ensure account1

# Smart mode: check first, generate if needed (show browser)
npm run cookies:ensure:show account1

üõ†Ô∏è Utility Commands

# Setup new account
npm run setup:account

# Check system status
npm run test:status

# List all accounts
npm run test:list

# Validate cookies
npm run test:cookies

# Refresh cookies
npm run refresh:cookies

# Start scheduler (PM2)
npm start

# Stop scheduler
npm stop

# Restart scheduler
npm restart

# View logs
npm run logs

Scheduled Run (PM2)

pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
pm2 logs
pm2 monit

Control via Telegram

After setting up Telegram Bot, use commands:

  • /start - Start bot
  • /status - View status
  • /run - Run bot
  • /stop - Stop bot

8. Fitur Lengkap

üîÑ Multi-Account Management

Kelola semua akun Facebook Anda dari satu tempat:

  • Konfigurasi individual per akun
  • Monitoring health setiap akun
  • Auto cookie refresh
  • Account isolation (process terpisah)
  • Independent scheduling

‚ö° Smart Concurrency System

System canggih untuk managing banyak akun:

  • Priority Queue: HIGH, NORMAL, LOW priority
  • Fair Distribution: Fairness Score 0-100
  • Account Rotation: Round-robin automatic
  • Cooldown Protection: Jeda minimum 1 menit
  • Performance: Memory efficient, no leaks

ü§ñ AI-Powered Content

Komentar dan caption otomatis dengan AI:

  • 40+ AI Models tersedia
  • Google Gemini Flash (GRATIS!)
  • GPT-4, Claude 3, Llama 3
  • Context-aware responses
  • Multi-language support

üìä Real-time Monitoring

Dashboard monitoring lengkap:

  • Activity logs real-time
  • Success/failure statistics
  • Account health monitoring
  • Performance metrics
  • Telegram notifications

8. Complete Features

üîÑ Multi-Account Management

Manage all your Facebook accounts from one place:

  • Individual configuration per account
  • Health monitoring for each account
  • Auto cookie refresh
  • Account isolation (separate processes)
  • Independent scheduling

‚ö° Smart Concurrency System

Advanced system for managing many accounts:

  • Priority Queue: HIGH, NORMAL, LOW priority
  • Fair Distribution: Fairness Score 0-100
  • Account Rotation: Automatic round-robin
  • Cooldown Protection: Minimum 1 minute interval
  • Performance: Memory efficient, no leaks

ü§ñ AI-Powered Content

Automatic comments and captions with AI:

  • 40+ AI Models available
  • Google Gemini Flash (FREE!)
  • GPT-4, Claude 3, Llama 3
  • Context-aware responses
  • Multi-language support

üìä Real-time Monitoring

Complete monitoring dashboard:

  • Real-time activity logs
  • Success/failure statistics
  • Account health monitoring
  • Performance metrics
  • Telegram notifications

9. Troubleshooting

Masalah Windows

‚ùå "Scripts disabled" / Error Execution Policy

Solusi Terbaik: Gunakan setup-windows.bat (tidak ada masalah execution policy!)

Alternatif:

Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser

‚ùå "Node not found"

Restart PowerShell/Command Prompt atau komputer setelah instalasi Node.js

Masalah Linux

‚ùå "Permission denied"

chmod +x setup-linux.sh

‚ùå "npm install fails"

npm cache clean --force
npm install

Masalah Lisensi

‚ùå "Invalid license"

Periksa format: FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

‚ùå "HWID limit reached"

Hubungi support untuk reset HWID atau upgrade paket

‚ùå "CloudDB not configured"

Pastikan file .env ada di folder root dengan Vault credentials yang benar

‚ùå "Account limit exceeded"

Anda telah mencapai batas akun untuk paket lisensi Anda. Upgrade ke paket yang lebih tinggi atau hapus beberapa akun.

9. Troubleshooting

Windows Issues

‚ùå "Scripts disabled" / Execution Policy Error

Best Solution: Use setup-windows.bat (no execution policy issues!)

Alternative:

Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser

‚ùå "Node not found"

Restart PowerShell/Command Prompt or computer after Node.js installation

Linux Issues

‚ùå "Permission denied"

chmod +x setup-linux.sh

‚ùå "npm install fails"

npm cache clean --force
npm install

License Issues

‚ùå "Invalid license"

Check format: FBPRO-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

‚ùå "HWID limit reached"

Contact support to reset HWID or upgrade package

‚ùå "CloudDB not configured"

Ensure .env file exists in root folder with correct Vault credentials

‚ùå "Account limit exceeded"

You've reached the account limit for your license package. Upgrade to a higher package or remove some accounts.
